mapper.insert: insert into member (id, age, lobbyte, lobstring, membertype, username, regdate, team_id) values (#{id}, #{age}, #{lobbyte}, #{lobstring}, #{membertype}, #{username}, #{regdate}, #{team_id})
mapper.select: select * FROM member WHERE id = #{id} and age = #{age}
select * from member m join team t on m.team_id = t.id where t.id = #{id} order by id
